thread.title: Azeri FM reports positive results in peace process with Armenia - Panorama | Armenian news
thread.title_full: Azeri FM reports positive results in peace process with Armenia - Panorama | Armenian news

author: Helix Consulting LLC
title: Azeri FM reports positive results in peace process with Armenia - Panorama | Armenian news
text: [Politics](https://www.panorama.am/en/news/politics)17:06 28/12/2023 Region Azeri FM reports positive results in peace process with Armenia Azerbaijani Foreign Minister Jeyhun Bayramov positively assesses the progress in negotiations with Armenia on a bilateral peace treaty. "The peace process with Armenia yielded certain positive results at the end of 2023. They were achieved as a result of direct contacts between Baku and Yerevan," he told a press conference on Thursday. Bayramov expressed hope for more direct talks with Armenia in 2024. "In the meantime, we are working on a peace treaty. In particular, we have presented our package of proposals to Armenia," the foreign minister added.
